name: Easy Chocolate Martinis for Two
author: thehungryscientist
summary: Toast your love with this recipe made just for two. Creamy and chocolaty, it's a post-dinner drink and dessert in one.
ingredients: 4 tablespoons chocolate syrup (such as Hershey's®), or to taste
2 fluid ounces chocolate liqueur (such as Godiva®)
1 fluid ounce white creme de cacao
directions: Pour sugar onto a small plate
Wet the rims of 2 martini glasses with water, then dip rims in sugar to coat
Drizzle 1 tablespoon chocolate syrup onto the inside of each glass
Put ice in a cocktail shaker
Add vodka, chocolate liqueur, creme de cacao, half-and-half, and remaining chocolate syrup
Cover and shake until outside of shaker has frosted
Garnish with additional syrup and maraschino cherries
